title: 2020 Hong Kong legislative election make disagreement

replies.msg:
2020 Hong Kong legislative election is not a democracy election

It have 35 Direct election and 35 Functional constituency
35 Functional constituency is controlled by CCP

Some protester think need to join election + street protest to fight for freedom and democracy


Some protester think need to boycott election and out for system to fight for freedom




What can we do

Complete Out for system
Join for system + street protest
